meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one thousandth of a micron.
meanings.sent1: A millimicron is a tiny measurement used in science.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use millimicrons to measure extremely small objects.
meanings.sent3: I tried to measure the ant with a millimicron, but it was too small to see!
meanings.sent4: The millimicron was so small, it felt like trying to measure a whisper.
meanings.sent5: The concept of a millimicron is like trying to capture a snowflake with a butterfly net.

meanings.definition: A very small unit of measurement.
meanings.sent1: When baking, even a millimicron of salt can make a big difference in taste.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler needed a millimicron tool to work on the delicate necklace.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally added a millimicron too much sugar to the recipe!
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was so precise, it was like measuring with a millimicron.
meanings.sent5: The millimicron of doubt in his mind grew into a mountain of uncertainty.
